summary: A Wingo game project where the user wants to create a new platform.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Neon-glowing Wingo game logo with bold stylized text on a transparent background (wingo-logo.dim_400x120.png)
- Dark neon background texture with subtle grid lines and faint colored light streaks in red, green, and violet (game-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Build a Wingo game frontend with: a lobby/home screen showing the current round countdown timer, last 10 round results (number + color badge), a betting panel where users can select a number (0-9) or a color (Red/Green/Violet) and enter a bet amount, a Place Bet button that calls the backend, a results modal or notification showing the round outcome and whether the player won or lost, and a bet history table showing the player's past bets with outcome.

Apply a vibrant, neon-lit casino-style visual theme across the entire app: deep dark background (near-black), bright neon accent colors aligned with game colors (red, green, violet, gold for wins), bold modern typography, glowing card and button effects, and a clean grid-based layout. Render the generated logo (wingo-logo.dim_400x120.png) and background (game-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) from frontend/public/assets/generated as static assets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a new platform in the Wingo game

Create a Wingo number prediction game backend with the following core logic: support multiple rounds (each round has a countdown timer, a winning number 0-9, and a color result: red for 1/3/7/9, green for 2/4/6/8, violet for 0/5); store player bets (player ID, round ID, bet type: number or color, bet amount); determine winners and calculate payouts (number bet pays 9x, color bet pays 2x, violet pays 4.5x); expose query functions for current round state, round history, and player bet history; expose update functions to place a bet and trigger round resolution.
